entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Whitby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 26 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:26 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:26 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:26 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
